text: It's not possible unless you connect FA Pro or HubSpot updates the library available, see this idea for more details: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-FontAwesome-version-6/idi-p/799665|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-FontAwesome-version-6/idi-p/799665>

If your preview and live page are different, you probably just need to click the orange "Update" button on the listing page.
Hi All What are the permission needed for HubSpot user to use a connected APP?
I can’t seem to get the page builder to load — anyone else experiencing this? I’ve got a suspicion it might be related to the outages hitting other services this morning.

Thanks for the suggestion, but there appears to be a bug. I created a new blog and my template displayed correctly. Suggestion courtesy of: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Blog-Website-Page-Publishing/Blog-listing-custom-template-visible-in-preview-mode-but-not/td-p/798017>
